message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am not able to pay $18,000 for it. Would you consider accepting a counteroffer of $15,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $15,000. Could you do $16,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I am still unable to meet at $16,500. Would you be open to $15,500?
